item.title: SCANIA HIGHLINE 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
SCANIA HIGHLINE 1.50 ETS2

– Eurotrotter, Globetrotter and Globetrotter XL Cabin
– 5 chassis options
– 5 engines (380, 420, 460, 470, 520)
– Own interiors and animation
– 3 transmission (SR and VT)
– Lightmask
– Baked AO
– Support DLC CA, Wolly & SISL’s Accessories Packs
– Trailer Cables
– Animation of wipers and windows
– Full skinable. Three 4K skins templates included



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Marcopolo GV 1150 MB 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Marcopolo GV 1150 MB 1.50 ETS2

Animated doors
37 paintings + 10 skin edits per chasis
4 passenger capacity levels
47 side signs
Floors
Curtains
Accessories with physics (cabin – exterior)
Much more

item.title: Arnook’s Container Pack Fix v18.0 ETS2
item.description:
Arnook’s Container Pack Fix v18.0 ETS2

Changelog :
Fix V18: 25/07/2024
– Fixed defs for the 20ft Open-tops

V18 : 21/07/2024
– First Release on the Steam Workshop
– Mod completely adapted to game version 1.50
– Added 20ft/2x20ft/40ft/45ft curtainsider containers (35 skins in total)
– Added compatibility for the Wielton trailer DLC
– Added the curtainsiders to the traffic
– Fixed traffic showing up default SCS containers

Features :
– Full compatibility with the SCS, Krone, VAK V-Slider & Schmitz S.CF chassis configurations (HCT, B-Link, singles, doubles, flatbeds, etc… everything that uses 20ft, 2x20fts, 45fts and/or 40fts)
– Available in the freight Market & for owned trailers
– About the 45ft containers : you can only use them if you own one of the two new dedicated 45ft chassis available (new variants for the SCS chassis), they are NOT available for the freight market
– The skin-selection is made randomly by the game (same system as SCS’s original containers)
– All container variants in traffic
– Supports both default & custom dedicated cargos :
– Default cargos : just use the same cargos as you usually do and the default skins will be replaced by mine
– Dedicated cargos :search for “Box Container SC” OR “Box Container HC” OR “Reefer Container” OR “Reefer Container HC” OR “ISO Tank Container” OR “Flatrack container” OR “Open-Top container”, depending on the type of container that you want

Add-Ons :
VAK 45ft CHASSIS OPTIONAL ADD-ON – FOR V10 and higher
AI TRAIN ADD-ON (05/03/2024) – FOR V17 & V18 ONLY



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Brighter Turn Signals v1.50.20s ATS
item.description:
Brighter Turn Signals v1.50.20s ATS

This mod makes the truck lights, headlights, blinker lights as well as trailer brake lights and turn signals brighter

The goal of this mod is to make truck lights, headlights, blinker lights as well as
trailer brake lights and turn signals brighter, so I will not decrease the brightness of the lights

v1.50.20s Changelog:
Bug fixes
Other tweaks & improvements



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Multiple Trailers in Traffic v1.50.2 ATS
item.description:
Multiple Trailers in Traffic v1.50.2 ATS

Bottom dumpers: Pup double, Rocky Mountain double, pup triple
Dry bulk tanks: B-double, Pup double, Rocky Mountain double, pup triple
Dry vans: B-double, Rocky Mountain double, Turnpike double, pup triple
Flatbeds: B-double, Pup double, Rocky Mountain double, Turnpike double, pup triple
Fuel tankers: Double & triple trailers – dolly types & B-double
Gas tanker: B-double
Food tankers: Double & triple trailers – dolly types only
Goosenecks: B-double, Rocky Mountain and Turnpike double with container, tank and miscellaneous cargo
Grain hopper: Pup double, pup triple, b-double & turnpike double
Insulated vans: B-double, Pup double, Rocky Mountain double, pup triple
Lowboys: Double (2-3) and triple (2-2-2 & 3-3-3) with assorted cargo
Nasty sliding tarp Things: B-double, Pup double, Rocky Mountain double, pup triple
Reefers: B-double, Rocky Mountain double, Turnpike double, pup triple
Side dumpers: B-double and Turnpike double trailers
Truck transports – Kenworth T680 and Western Star 49xx
Double versions of all SCS trucks not already included in the base game
Mildly modifie versions of some Jazzycat painted trucks which haul flatbed & dropdeck trailers only. This is to reduce the incidence of empty flatbeds.
Anything that isn’t a def file for the other trailer mods, basically
Easter Eggs
A former The Prime Minister (possibly)

v1.50.2:
20′ HC Arnook containers.
Articulated dumper and railway wagons in Oversize DLC addon.
Extra colours for Telehandler cargo.
Learn how to spell “oklahoma”.
More cargo for dropdecks, flatbeds, lowboys, car & van transporters.
More colours AND smaller files for single trailers.
Reduced spawn freqency of double goosenecks
Regional variation in agricultural & forestry frequencies.
Rework distribution of 53′ trailers as there ISN’T a blanket ban in California after all.
Spiffy paint jobs for divers tanks & dumpers.
Triples for cargo in parts of Canada.
Vertical opening bottom dumpers.
And the inevitable bug fixes…



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
